page.title: 19Much Marcle Youth Club
page.content: The youth club was founded in 1979 to give the children of the village somewhere to meet on Wednesday evenings. It is organised in two groups. The first is for 6-11years and meets from 6.30-7.45 pm. There are 22 members in Junior Youth Club and they play rounders, snooker and table tennis. The Senior group has 25 members and meets after the juniors have gone home. They have darts, indoor hockey, cricket and swimming. This year the club is going to Butlins at Barry Island. The trips are very good because the members can go exploring on their own. It costs 30p a night to go to Youth Club but it is really worth it. It is great fun and there is nothing else to do.
